edu.cmu.commons.data.dao.mongo.reflect
Annotation Type Polymorphic

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
public @interface Polymorphic

Indicates that a property of a composite type should be considered polymorphic for the purposes of marshalling. Any Marshaller which supports the property should encode the property value's runtime type within marshalling output so that later on an instance of the appropriate type may be created to store unmarshalled data.

Author:
hazen
See Also:
ReflectionMarshallerFactory
